attributes.action: legalise all addictive drugs and make them available only from government shops and use the income generated to solve the financial problems of the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is an area of 'easy' money raising activity which it is difficult to believe that our government has not taken advantage of it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
